snippet: Gunmen abducted the president of the Libyan Olympic Committee in the nation’s capital, grabbing him from his car and bundling him into a waiting vehicle, his brother said Monday.
abstract: Gunmen abduct Ahmed Nabil al-Taher al-Alam, president of the Libyan Olympic Committee, in Tripoli, grabbing him from his car and bundling him into a waiting vehicle.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen abducted the president of the Libyan Olympic Committee in the nation’s capital, grabbing him from his car and bundling him into a waiting vehicle, his brother said Monday.
